task.name: hifv_vlasetjy
task.shortdescription: Does an initial setjy run on the vis

param.name: vis
param.description: List of visibility data files. These may be ASDMs, tar files of ASDMs, MSes, or tar files of MSes, If ASDM files are specified, they will be converted to MS format. example: vis=['X227.ms', 'asdms.tar.gz']

param.name: field
param.description: List of field names or ids. Only can be set in pipelinemode='interactive'.

param.name: intent
param.description: Observing intent of flux calibrators. Only can be set in pipelinemode='interactive'.

param.name: spw
param.description: List of spectral window ids. Only can be set in pipelinemode='interactive'.

param.name: model
param.description: File location for field model. Only can be set in pipelinemode='interactive'.

param.name: reffile
param.description: Path to file with fluxes for non-solar system calibrators. Only can be set in pipelinemode='interactive'

param.name: fluxdensity
param.description: Specified flux density [I,Q,U,V]; -1 will lookup values

param.name: spix
param.description: Spectral index of fluxdensity. Can be set when fluxdensity is not -1

param.name: reffreq
param.description: Reference frequency for spix. Can be set when fluxdensity is not -1

param.name: scalebychan
param.description: Scale the flux density on a per channel basis or else on a per spw basis

param.name: pipelinemode
param.description: The pipeline operating mode. In 'automatic' mode the pipeline determines the values of all context defined pipeline inputs automatically. In 'interactive' mode the user can set the pipeline context defined parameters manually. In 'getinputs' mode the user can check the settings of all pipeline parameters without running the task.

param.name: dryrun
param.shortdescription: Run the task (False) or display task command (True)
param.description: Run the commands (True) or generate the commands to be run but do not execute (False). This is a pipeline task execution mode.

param.name: acceptresults
param.shortdescription: Add the results into the pipeline context
param.description: Add the results of the task to the pipeline context (True) or reject them (False). This is a pipeline task execution mode.

task.example:
The hifv_vlasetjy task does an initial run of setjy on the vis
Output:
results -- If pipeline mode is 'getinputs' then None is returned. Otherwise the results object for the pipeline task is returned.
standard -- Flux density standard default: ''
Examples
1. Initial run of setjy:
hifv_vlasetjy()
